response.original_title: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus | Real-Time Fandub Games
response.overview: A group of voice actors dub the dialogue from Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus... in one take... with zero rehearsal. This is the result.
response.tagline: A group of voice actors dub the dialogue from Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus... in one take... with zero rehearsal. This is the result.
